name: Enter the Bloodgon!
description:
TUTORIAL  

  • Click on the (Skull icon) to move to a new position.  
  • Find paths to best navigate through the mart with the least amount of interactions. 
  • Press (F icon) to respawn in a previous location. 
  • If compelled to a conversation, choose options to minimize the extent of the talk. 
  • Find the blood carton and escape out of the mart. 
  • Keep the germs bar at the lowest to avoid getting sick. 

The game is a visual novel with strategy that follows the day with the one and only Dracula, as he goes on a trip to the market in search for his precious blood cartons. The pandemic is raging, and you take extra precautions to not contract any germs. The goal is to avoid or minimize the conversations you have with the other unique shoppers of the Mart by either choosing the right paths or choosing words that minimize conversations. Find the blood cartons and get out of there fast, before the germs get to you!!

The game incorporates the 'Minimal interactions' and the 'Reset' themes for the game.
